entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 2:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon except rain along the coast. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to flurries overnight. Rain along the coast this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm except rainfall amount 15 mm along parts of the coast. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
